title: Bad block #2616706 (0xb44e5466b2d7f1df73e45efbc6e00aa6aa07456e484d91e8d1341dbb8092f96b)
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `geth 1.4.18-stable-c72f5459`
OS & Version: FreeBSD 11.0-RELEASE-p2

#### Expected behaviour
Sync correctly when I launch `geth --fast --cache=1024 --jitvm --jitcache=64`

#### Actual behaviour
Loop

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
Run `geth --fast --cache=1024 --jitvm --jitcache=64`
